mapper.insert: insert into db_analysetype (SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', FLAG, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, DESCRIPTION) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_analysetype set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', FLAG, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, DESCRIPTION from db_analysetype
